subject: College Athletics
Football
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: The Mountain West Conference wants to lead the fight for a major college football playoff. The conference presented the Bowl Championship Series with a proposal Wednesday to create an eight-team playoff system that would allow greater access to the national championship game to teams outside the six most powerful leagues. The B.C.S. said the proposal would be discussed at its April meeting.
